page.title: 10Field Sports
page.content: There is no main fishing river in this area,although a few trout are caught in the Brockey,and one farmer has dammed a stream to make a fishpond. There is no organised shoot,but there is plenty of rough shooting and ferreting as there is a very big rabbit population.A few pheasants are reared in the area. The Dulverton East Foxhounds are cubbing late summer until hunting starts in November.Devon & Somerset Staghounds occasionally hunt here.The Culmstock Otterhounds sometimes work the Brockey hunting mink,not otter.3 or 4 people living in the area ride to hounds,several others regularly follow the hunt(by car).One farmer's son is terrier man for the Dulverton East Foxhounds.
